biocontainers.name: phylophlan
biocontainers.summary: Precise phylogenetic analysis of microbial isolates and genomes from metagenomes

biotools.summary: PhyloPhlAn is a comprehensive and scalable pipeline for phylogenetic profiling of microbial genomes and metagenomes. It enables accurate species- and strain-level classification, including for MAGs, and reconstructs large-scale phylogenies using clade-specific markers.
